posts.postText: Hey, I'm gonna have to go for 4 days or so, taking a trip to see some family i haven't seen in awhile, I'll be signed on steam but no Gmod TF CSS or anything. I'm leaving right after i make this post so, Cyah guys.

What no

fuck

Now i have to hang with the rhq guys

Quick update, i made it to the place im going, i took my laptop, which i learned has TF2 on it, i can play TF and only TF2 for the next 3 days.


Edit: Quick update, I'll be back tomorrow morning, We wanna get home in time for 4th of July, so I can play TF2 on my laptop tonight but i should be back tomorrow morning.

Punk your going away for 4 days kk see you then!
-the doctor
Nice job reviving a dead post.
